title: Staff Login with Correct Credentials and 2FA
description: Verify that staff can log in successfully using correct username/email and password, including two-factor authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to staff login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Submit login form.
Perform two-factor authentication using valid 2FA code.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails when staff enters an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to staff login page.
Enter valid username/email and incorrect password.
Submit login form.
Verify an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials and login is denied.

title: Password Reset Flow for Staff
description: Verify staff can successfully reset their password through the password reset feature.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page.
Enter registered email address.
Submit password reset request.
Verify confirmation message is shown stating password reset instructions sent.
Follow link in email and set a new password.
Verify staff can log in successfully with the new password.

title: Package Intake with Barcode Scanning and Photo Documentation
description: Verify staff can intake a package by scanning barcode, capturing a photo, associating with customer and submitting successfully.

steps.description: Log in as operations staff.
Navigate to package intake page.
Scan package barcode.
Capture photo of package condition.
Associate package with existing customer profile.
Submit package intake.
Verify package is saved in system with correct barcode, photo, and customer association, and intake process time is under 2 minutes.

title: Package Intake Offline Mode and Data Synchronization
description: Verify that package intake can be completed offline and data synchronizes correctly when connection is restored.

steps.description: Log in as operations staff on mobile app with offline-first capability.
Turn off network connectivity.
Perform package intake with barcode scanning, photo capture, and customer association.
Verify intake is saved locally with no errors.
Restore network connectivity.
Verify package intake data is synchronized to the central database correctly.

title: Customer Notification Sent via Preferred Channel and Language
description: Verify automated notifications are sent to customers according to their language preference (Spanish/English) and selected notification channels (SMS, Email, in-app).

steps.description: Create or update customer profile with language preference set to Spanish and channels to SMS and Email.
Trigger notification event (e.g., package arrival).
Verify notification is sent successfully via SMS and Email in Spanish.
Update customer preference to English and channel to in-app messaging only.
Trigger notification event.
Verify notification is delivered via in-app messaging in English.

title: Notification Delivery Failure Handling and Retry
description: Verify the system retries and logs failures when notifications cannot be delivered via selected channels.

steps.description: Simulate failure in delivering notification via SMS (e.g., invalid phone number).
Trigger notification.
Verify system attempts retry according to retry policy and logs failure details.
Verify notification sent via alternate available channels if configured.

title: Mailbox Rental Workflow with Digital Agreement and Billing
description: Verify mailbox rental process including availability checking, digital contract generation, signing, and integrated billing compliant with PR payment standards.

steps.description: Log in as staff.
Check mailbox availability for requested period.
Verify availability status is accurate and up-to-date.
Create new mailbox rental agreement digitally.
Customer signs the agreement electronically.
Complete billing process including invoice generation and collect payment.
Verify billing complies with Puerto Rico payment standards and invoice is recorded.

title: Compliance Report Generation and Submission
description: Verify automated generation and submission of compliance reports including CMRA quarterly certifications and Puerto Rico regulatory reports.

steps.description: Trigger compliance report generation for current quarter.
Verify report contains all required fields per USPS and Puerto Rico regulations.
Submit generated report to regulatory authorities.
Verify submission confirmation received and logged.
Verify system alerts staff of upcoming deadlines.

title: Customer Mobile App Access to Mail Status and Appointments
description: Verify customers can log in and view their mail status, payment history, and schedule appointments in the customer mobile app, supporting both Spanish and English languages.

steps.description: Login to customer mobile app with valid credentials.
Verify mail status for all packages is displayed correctly.
Verify payment history is accurate.
Schedule appointment using app functionality.
Verify appointment is scheduled and confirmation is shown.
Switch app language from Spanish to English and vice versa.
Verify app content and notifications update accordingly.

title: Dashboard Analytics Accuracy and Real-Time Update
description: Verify management dashboard displays accurate operational, financial, and compliance metrics with real-time updates.

steps.description: Login as manager.
Navigate to analytics dashboard.
Verify dashboard shows correct performance statistics, revenue figures, and compliance status.
Perform operations that affect metrics (e.g., package intake, payment).
Verify dashboard updates metrics in real time within acceptable delay.

title: Multi-Location Data Synchronization After Network Restore
description: Verify that data from multiple locations using the system synchronize correctly after network outages with no data loss or conflicts.

steps.description: Simulate operations offline in two different locations, entering new package intakes, customer updates, and billing data.
Restore network connectivity for both locations.
Verify all data is synchronized to central database accurately.
Verify no data conflicts or duplicates exist post-synchronization.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify system enforces role-based access control preventing users from accessing unauthorized features or data.

steps.description: Login as operations staff.
Attempt to access management dashboard and compliance modules.
Verify access is denied with appropriate error message.
Login as manager.
Access all permitted features successfully.
Verify no unauthorized access is possible beyond assigned roles.

title: Data Encryption at Rest and in Transit
description: Verify sensitive data is encrypted both at rest in the database and during transmission over the network.

steps.description: Capture network traffic during login and data operations.
Verify all sensitive data including passwords, personal data, and payment information is transmitted using encrypted channels (e.g., TLS).
Check storage layers (e.g., PostgreSQL) for encryption configuration.
Verify sensitive data at rest is encrypted according to security policy.

title: Audit Log Creation and Access
description: Verify that all critical user actions are recorded in audit logs and logs can be accessed securely by authorized personnel.

steps.description: Perform critical actions such as login, package intake, billing update.
Access audit logs as an authorized security personnel.
Verify logs contain timestamps, user details, action types, and are tamper-proof.
Attempt to access audit logs as unauthorized user.
Verify access is denied.

title: Progressive Web App Offline Functionality on iOS and Android
description: Verify mobile apps on iOS and Android support offline operations, allow data entry, and sync when online, with UI and language defaulting to Spanish.

steps.description: Install app on iOS and Android devices.
Launch app with no network connectivity.
Verify app loads and UI displays primarily in Spanish.
Perform offline operations such as package intake or mailbox rental.
Verify operations succeed without errors.
Restore connectivity.
Verify all offline data synchronizes correctly.

title: Integration with USPS API for Package Tracking
description: Verify that the system correctly integrates with USPS API for real-time package tracking updates.

steps.description: Submit package tracking request via system.
Verify system calls USPS API and receives valid tracking information.
Verify tracking information is displayed correctly to staff and customers.

title: Financial Reporting Accuracy and Billing Automation
description: Verify automated billing generates accurate invoices and financial reports reflect true operational data.

steps.description: Perform mailbox rental and package intake with various billing scenarios.
Trigger billing run to generate invoices.
Verify invoices are generated with correct amounts and details.
Access financial reports from dashboard.
Verify reports accurately reflect all billed and received payments.

title: Error Boundary Display and Recovery
description: Verify global and route-specific error boundaries catch errors and display user-friendly error messages with options to recover.

steps.description: Simulate runtime error in route component.
Verify route error boundary displays custom error message.
Trigger error outside routing context.
Verify global error boundary displays fallback UI allowing reload or navigation.

title: User Training Completion and Feature Utilization Monitoring
description: Verify that the system tracks user training progress and monitors usage to ensure 90% feature utilization within two weeks.

steps.description: Log user training completions in the system.
Verify training completion percentages are tracked accurately.
Monitor feature usage metrics for users over two weeks.
Verify at least 90% of critical features have been utilized by users.
